pkgmetadata.longdescription: # jupyterlab-night[![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/martinRenou/jupyterlab-night/main?urlpath=lab)JupyterLab dark theme inspired by the Github dark theme## Requirements* JupyterLab >= 3.0## InstallTo install the extension, execute:```bashconda install jupyterlab-night -c conda-forge```or```bashpip install jupyterlab-night```![jupyterlab-night](jupyterlab-night.png)
